title: Apache Camel version in io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-camel-bom is older in 3.3.3/3.4.0-RC1/main than in 3.2.6.Final
body:
### Describe the bug

Hi!

Is there a reason why the version of Apache Camel is set to `4.0.0` in [quarkus-camel-bom from Quarkus 3.2.6.Final](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-platform/blob/6ad953a387d10ca141e50357cb2a9396a9fd5b81/generated-platform-project/quarkus-camel/bom/pom.xml#L6360-L6364) while that same version is set to `4.0.0-RC2` in [Quarkus 3.3.3 or 3.4.0-RC1](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-platform/blob/b9e07820b38e1251cf6f36070ec69df16a2214f5/generated-platform-project/quarkus-camel/bom/pom.xml#L6380-L6384) and the [main](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-platform/blob/e3725c1cb84de13ec70ec0911989060f1f4fb16a/generated-platform-project/quarkus-camel/bom/pom.xml#L6379-L6383) branch?

### Expected behavior

Apache Camel version should be `4.0.0` in Quarkus `3.4.0` and in the `main` branch.

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_
